data.title: How to create an account on PlayStation Network
meta_keywords: How to create an account on PlayStation Network
data.meta_description: Find out how to set up an account for PlayStation™Network.
data.text:
If you already have an account on your PS4 console, you can use the same account for your PS5 console. You can have your Playstation®Plus subscription, trophies, friends, and other information on your PS5 console, while still having them on your PS4 console.

Go to the home screen and select the profile picture.

Select Switch User > Add User > Get Started.

Select Create an Account from the sign-in screen.

Enter the necessary information.

Verify your email address. Check your email for a verification message. Follow the instructions in the message to verify your email address.
